name: simple-js-hit-game
tagline: simple interactive game developed using HTML, CSS and JavaScript.
body:
"Hit Da Golf" =============
Current version: beta
"Hit Da Golf" is a beta version, simple interactive game developed using HTML, CSS and JavaScript. User's every hit time is calculated and Based on number of user hits with speed, average of hit speed is calculated. ![Image preview is not available](https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/-4L-_R4Pvhm8/VGOzUbEHqkI/AAAAAAAABeo/4YJ4ylqyv-s/w512-h279-no/js-hit-game.jpg) ONLINE DEMO Follow news and developments on twitter: @santup
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
